ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] WOW, Huge improvements this patch...
ygData.msgSnippet: Shaman would be considered pure casters of a priest class. I m guessing they did nothing for bards since the mana pool for bards is just there to limit a few
ygData.messageBody:
Shaman would be considered pure casters of a priest class. I'm guessing they
did nothing for bards since the mana pool for bards is just there to limit a
few songs. Heck, Gordon has said that +mana items don't do anything for
bards.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 2000 12:24 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] WOW, Huge improvements this patch...


> They didn't mention shamans either. Hopefully they did mean all hybrids.
>
> Peace
> Evulia, twink of twelve tunes, Tunare
>
> > From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>
> > did notice that we are the only hybrid not to get a mana increase
> > apparently, wonder if that's true? If the hybrid mana mod is
> > just a toggle,
> > bet there's a whole slew of DDD's massacres tonight ;-)
> >
> > Kit
> >
> > - Rangers, Paladins, and SKs now have mana equivalent to that
> > of a pure
> > caster with the same stats. This will give those hybrids a
> > good deal more
> > mana, regardless of their stats.
>
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
